How many people are affected by Imerslund-Grsbeck syndrome ?,"Imerslund-Grsbeck syndrome is a rare condition that was first described in Finland and Norway; in these regions, the condition is estimated to affect 1 in 200,000 people. The condition has also been reported in other countries worldwide; its prevalence in these countries is unknown.",GHR,Imerslund-Grsbeck syndrome
